A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie! To be honest I was really shocked by the mixed audience reviews. I loved the acting\, the special effects\, and the story. I also really enjoyed seeing it with my kids and when a surprising part happened we would exchange surprised looks with eachother. I felt so strongly about loving this movie I made sure to sign up to give a review which I never do. This is a must see in the theatres!
